item.title: About me
item.description: English Analyst & datascientist with experience in digital transformation in various administrations levels. Confirmed analyst with 5+ years experience in sustainable development questions and data scientist with 3+ years experience. Skilled in problem solving, programming and statistics (with attractive design). Shake out-of-the-box thinking to generate insight ! I am looking for new opportunities. Français Analyste et datascientifique ayant une expérience de la transformation numérique à différents niveaux de l'administration.

item.title: Resume / CV
item.description: English Experience datascientist @Ministry of Environment jan. 2019 - current position Regarding 2 years law applience : lead design, development and production of a national application, a quarterly survey and a data reference. Project management of 2 apps. : 1 in mutation (corner-stone of housing policy) to business object and 1 in dev. (< 100k €). head of studies @Ministry of Environment sept. 2017 - dec. 2018 Design and production of an automatic territorial observatory for fast KPI's.
